- Азиатская речь

- Поляки

- Поляки с уровнем iq 0

+ Сейчас она бесплатна

No other way to go about it but to say it's CS. You know what game you're getting yourself into, so you know what to expect. If you want to have a good experience while playing it, I suggest getting prime either by reaching lvl 21 (which is gonna take a long time) or to buy it for 13 and something euros. 

Bottom line is, buy prime, have 4 more friends with prime, and you're good to go
